岝岝岝

岝字的基本解释

岝
zuò
〔岝??〕a.山石高峻的样子，如“后岭横岝岝。”b.山名。

岝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zuò］
［《廣韻》在各切，入鐸，從。］
［《廣韻》鋤陌切，入陌，崇。］
亦作“岞1”。
(1)见“岝崿”。

岝字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　岝； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页308第34
【廣韻】鋤陌切【集韻】側格切，?音窄。山名。【吳志】支硎山，支道林所居，今名岝㟧山。　又【廣韻】在各切【集韻】疾各切，?音昨。岝㟧，山高貌。

岝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
岝字的起名意思

暂无。

岝
Basic explanation of words
岝
zuò
〔岝??〕 a. The appearance of high mountains and rocks, such as "Hou Ling Heng Tuo." b. The name of the mountain.
岝
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zuò］
["Guangyun" in each cut, enter the priest, follow. ]
["Guangyun" hoe the Mo cut, enter the Mo, Chong. ]
Also known as "岞1".
(1) See "岝崿".
岝
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　岝; Kangxi strokes: 8; Page number: page 308 34
[Guang Yun] Hoe Mo cut [Ji Yun] Side grid cut, narrow sound. Mountain name. [Wu Zhi] Zhiyao Mountain, where the Zhidao Forest resides, is now called Aomi Mountain.　[Guangyun] in each cut [Ji Yun], the sound is yesterday.岝㟧, high mountain appearance.
岝

岝
Name meaning
Nothing.
zuò
name of a mountain in Shandong
